alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 10 at 4:00PM EST until March 10 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hamilton County in northern Florida... Southwestern Echols County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 430 PM EST. * At 400 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Lake Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jennings, Blue Springs and Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
